name: GridApiConfig
description: Grid API client configuration object for initializing the Grid API client with environment settings, authentication, and optional customizations.

properties.name: apiKey
properties.description: API key for authentication. Optional for frontend operations.

properties.name: environment
properties.description: Target environment for API calls (sandbox or production).

properties.name: baseUrl
properties.description: Base URL for the Grid API.

properties.name: timeout
properties.description: Request timeout in milliseconds.

properties.name: retryAttempts
properties.description: Number of retry attempts for failed requests.

properties.name: solanaRpcUrl
properties.description: Optional Solana RPC endpoint URL.

name: GridErrorDetail
description: Detailed error information from API validation failures

properties.name: field
properties.description: The field that caused the validation error

properties.name: code
properties.description: Machine-readable error code

properties.name: message
properties.description: Human-readable error message

properties.name: suggestion
properties.description: Suggestion for fixing the error

properties.name: documentation
properties.description: Link to relevant documentation

name: GridResponse
description: Generic API response wrapper for all Grid API responses with configurable data type

properties.name: success
properties.description: Whether the API call was successful

properties.name: data
properties.description: Response data if successful

properties.name: error
properties.description: Error message if unsuccessful

properties.name: code
properties.description: Error code for programmatic handling

properties.name: details
properties.description: Detailed validation errors from API response

properties.name: timestamp
properties.description: Error timestamp from backend

properties.name: requestId
properties.description: Request ID for tracking and debugging

name: AuthenticationRequest
description: Authentication request parameters for various providers.

properties.name: email
properties.description: User email for email-based authentication

properties.name: keypair
properties.description: Key pair for cryptographic authentication

properties.name: passkeyId
properties.description: Passkey identifier for passkey authentication

properties.name: provider
properties.description: Authentication provider type

properties.name: expiration
properties.description: Authentication expiration timestamp

name: SignRequest
description: Sign Request

properties.name: sessionSecrets
properties.description: Secrets generated via generateSessionSecrets()

properties.name: session
properties.description: Optional session data from authentication via initAuth()

properties.name: transactionPayload
properties.description: Transaction data to be signed and sent

properties.name: provider
properties.description: Provider to use for signing (privy, turnkey)

name: SignAndSendRequest
description: Request to sign and send a transaction to the blockchain.

properties.name: sessionSecrets
properties.description: Cryptographic keys for signing

properties.name: session
properties.description: Optional session data from authentication

properties.name: transactionPayload
properties.description: Transaction data to be signed and sent

properties.name: address
properties.description: Target address for the transaction

name: TransactionPayload
description: Transaction payload containing the transaction data and required signatures.

properties.name: transaction
properties.description: Serialized transaction data

properties.name: transaction_signers
properties.description: Array of signer public keys

properties.name: kms_payloads
properties.description: Key management service payloads for signing

name: TransactionResult
description: Result of a transaction signing operation.

properties.name: transaction
properties.description: The signed transaction data

properties.name: kms_payloads
properties.description: Array of KMS signature payloads

name: UniversalKeyPair
description: Universal key pair structure for cryptographic operations.

properties.name: publicKey
properties.description: The public key as a string

properties.name: privateKey
properties.description: The private key as a string

properties.name: publicKeyUncompressed
properties.description: The public key as a string in uncompressed format (required for turnkey signing)

name: InitAuthRequest
description: Initialize authentication for an existing user.

properties.name: email
properties.description: User email for authentication

properties.name: expiration
properties.description: Authentication expiration timestamp

name: InitAuthData
description: Authentication initialization data for MPC providers (Privy, Turnkey, etc.)

properties.name: type
properties.description: Account type

properties.name: email
properties.description: User email address

properties.name: status
properties.description: Authentication status

properties.name: otp_sent
properties.description: Whether OTP was sent successfully

properties.name: otp_id
properties.description: Optional OTP identifier

properties.name: provider
properties.description: MPC provider type (privy, turnkey, passkey, external, dynamic)

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: Creation timestamp (ISO string)

properties.name: expires_at
properties.description: Expiration timestamp (ISO string)

name: InitAuthResponse
description: Response from authentication initialization

properties.name: data
properties.description: Authentication data (varies by provider type)

name: CompleteAuthRequestWithOtp
description: Request to complete authentication with OTP verification.

properties.name: expiration
properties.description: Authentication expiration

properties.name: otpCode
properties.description: The OTP code received by the user

properties.name: user
properties.description: User context information

properties.name: sessionSecrets
properties.description: Session-specific cryptographic secrets

name: CompleteAuthResponse
description: Response from completing authentication

properties.name: address
properties.description: User account address

properties.name: policies
properties.description: Account policies configuration

properties.name: grid_user_id
properties.description: Grid user ID

properties.name: authentication
properties.description: Provider authentication data

name: PasskeyInfo
description: Passkey Info

properties.name: address
properties.description: Passkey address

properties.name: role
properties.description: Role assigned to this passkey

properties.name: permissions
properties.description: Permissions granted to this passkey

properties.name: provider
properties.description: Authentication provider

properties.name: added_at
properties.description: When the passkey was added

name: GetPasskeysResponse
description: Get Passkeys Response

properties.name: account_address
properties.description: Account address

properties.name: passkey
properties.description: Passkey information

name: AddPasskeyResponse
description: Add Passkey Response

properties.name: transaction
properties.description: Transaction data

properties.name: passkey
properties.description: Added passkey information

properties.name: threshold
properties.description: Account threshold

properties.name: status
properties.description: Status of the operation

properties.name: expires_at
properties.description: Expiration time

name: AccountSigner
description: Represents a signer in a multi-signature account. Defines the signer's address, role, permissions, and authentication provider.

properties.name: address
properties.description: The public key address of the signer

properties.name: role
properties.description: The role assigned to this signer in the account (defaults to 'primary' if not provided)

properties.name: permissions
properties.description: Array of permissions granted to this signer

properties.name: provider
properties.description: Authentication provider used by this signer (defaults to 'external' if not provided)

name: AccountPolicies
description: Account policies configuration for multi-signature accounts. Defines the signers, approval threshold, and optional security restrictions.

properties.name: signers
properties.description: Array of account signers (1-10 signers required).

properties.name: threshold
properties.description: Number of signatures required for approval (must not exceed signers.length).

properties.name: time_lock
properties.description: Optional time lock in seconds (if provided, must be between 1 and u32::MAX).

properties.name: admin_address
properties.description: Optional admin address (Solana public key) for administrative functions.

name: UpdateAccountRequest
description: Request parameters for updating an existing Grid account's configuration. All fields are optional - only provide the fields you want to update.

properties.name: signers
properties.description: Optional array of signers to update the account with. Replaces existing signers if provided.

properties.name: threshold
properties.description: Optional approval threshold (number of required signatures). Must be between 1-10 and not exceed the number of signers.

properties.name: time_lock
properties.description: Optional time lock in seconds before transactions can be executed. Must be between 1 and u32::MAX if provided.

properties.name: admin_address
properties.description: Optional admin address for administrative functions. Pass null to remove existing admin.

properties.name: transaction_signers
properties.description: Optional array of signer addresses that must approve this update transaction.

name: CreateAccountInput
description: Simplified input for creating a Grid account. Provide either an email for email-based accounts or a signer public key for signer-based accounts.

properties.name: email
properties.description: Email address for email-based accounts.

properties.name: signer
properties.description: Solana public key for signer-based accounts.

name: EmailAccountRequest
description: Request format for creating an email-based account. The account will be associated with the provided email address.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Discriminator field indicating email account type.

properties.name: email
properties.description: Email address for the account.

name: SignersAccountRequest
description: Request format for creating a signer-based account. Allows full control over account policies including multiple signers and thresholds.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Discriminator field indicating signer account type.

properties.name: policies
properties.description: Account policies including signers, threshold, and optional restrictions.

properties.name: grid_user_id
properties.description: Optional Grid user ID to associate with the account.

properties.name: memo
properties.description: Optional memo for the account creation.

name: EmailAccountResponse
description: Response returned when creating an email-based account. Email accounts require subsequent authentication through initAuth and completeAuth flows before they can be used.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Discriminator field indicating this is an email account.

properties.name: email
properties.description: Email address associated with the account.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Current status of the email account.

properties.name: otp_sent
properties.description: Whether an OTP code was sent to the email.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: ISO timestamp when the account was created.

properties.name: expires_at
properties.description: ISO timestamp when the account request expires.

properties.name: memo
properties.description: Optional memo for the account.

name: SignersAccountResponse
description: Response returned when creating a signers-based account. Signers accounts are immediately active with the provided signers and policies from the account request.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Discriminator field indicating this is a signers account.

properties.name: address
properties.description: On-chain address of the created account.

properties.name: policies
properties.description: Account policies including signers and spending limits.

properties.name: grid_user_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the Grid user.

properties.name: memo
properties.description: Optional memo for the account.

name: GetAccountResponse
description: Response from getting an account, including its address, type, policies, and metadata.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Account type discriminator, indicating whether the account is email-based or signers-based.

properties.name: address
properties.description: On-chain address of the account.

properties.name: policies
properties.description: Account policies including signers, threshold, and optional time lock and admin address.

properties.name: grid_user_id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the Grid user that owns the account.

properties.name: memo
properties.description: Optional memo associated with the account.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: ISO timestamp when the account was created.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Current status of the account (for example active or disabled).

name: AccountTransaction
description: Individual transaction information from an account's transaction history.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique transaction identifier.

properties.name: signature
properties.description: Transaction signature hash.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Transaction status.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: ISO timestamp when the transaction was created.

properties.name: confirmed_at
properties.description: ISO timestamp when the transaction was confirmed, if applicable.

name: GetTransactionsResponse
description: Response from getting account transaction history.

properties.name: data
properties.description: Array of account transactions.

properties.name: error
properties.description: Error message if the request failed.

name: AccountBalancesData
description: Account balances data structure containing SOL and token balances.

properties.name: address
properties.description: Account address.

properties.name: lamports
properties.description: Raw SOL balance in lamports.

properties.name: sol
properties.description: SOL balance in SOL units.

properties.name: tokens
properties.description: Array of SPL token balances for the account.

name: PaymentDetails
description: Payment details describing the source or destination account and currency for a payment operation.

properties.name: account
properties.description: Optional Grid account address associated with the payment.

properties.name: address
properties.description: Optional external address (for example a Solana address) for the payment.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: Currency code or identifier used for the payment.

properties.name: payment_rail
properties.description: Optional payment rail identifier (for example on-chain, off-ramp provider, etc.).

properties.name: external_account_id
properties.description: Optional external account ID with a payment provider or integration.

name: CreatePaymentIntentRequest
description: Request body for creating a payment intent between a source and destination with a specified amount.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Payment amount as a string (typically in minor units or a decimal string, depending on currency).

properties.name: grid_user_id
properties.description: Grid user ID that owns or initiates the payment intent.

properties.name: source
properties.description: Source payment details for the intent.

properties.name: destination
properties.description: Destination payment details for the intent.

name: CreatePaymentIntentResponse
description: Response returned after creating a payment intent, including an optional transaction payload to sign and send, or an error message.

properties.name: data
properties.description: Optional data object that may contain a TransactionPayload plus additional fields, excluding the raw transaction, kms_payloads, and transaction_signers fields.

properties.name: error
properties.description: Error message if the payment intent creation failed.

name: UpdateSpendingLimitRequest
description: Request body for updating an existing spending limit, such as changing amount, mint, period, destinations, or transaction signers.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Optional new spending limit amount.

properties.name: mint
properties.description: Optional SPL token mint address for the spending limit.

properties.name: period
properties.description: Optional period over which the spending limit applies.

properties.name: spending_limit_signers
properties.description: Optional list of signer addresses that can use this spending limit.

properties.name: destinations
properties.description: Optional list of allowed destination addresses for this spending limit.

properties.name: expiration
properties.description: Optional expiration timestamp for the spending limit.

properties.name: transaction_signers
properties.description: Optional list of signer addresses that must approve the update transaction.

name: CreateSpendingLimitResponsePayload
description: Response payload for spending limit operations. Contains the spending limit address and transaction data required to execute spending limit operations on-chain.

properties.name: spending_limit_address
properties.description: On-chain address of the spending limit account.

properties.name: transaction
properties.description: Serialized transaction data ready for signing.

properties.name: kms_payloads
properties.description: Array of KMS payloads for multi-party signing.

properties.name: transaction_signers
properties.description: Optional array of transaction signer addresses.

name: SpendingLimitResponsePayload
description: Response payload for updating spending limit operations. Contains transaction data required to execute spending limit update operations on-chain, without the spending limit address.

properties.name: transaction
properties.description: Serialized transaction data ready for signing.

properties.name: transaction_signers
properties.description: Optional array of transaction signer addresses.

properties.name: kms_payloads
properties.description: Array of KMS payloads for multi-party signing.

name: SpendingLimitData
description: Detailed spending limit information returned from GET endpoints. Contains the full state of a spending limit including configuration, current usage, and metadata.

properties.name: address
properties.description: On-chain address of the spending limit account.

properties.name: settings_address
properties.description: Address of the spending limit settings account.

properties.name: main_account_address
properties.description: Address of the main smart account this spending limit belongs to.

properties.name: environment
properties.description: Environment where the spending limit exists (sandbox or production).

properties.name: mint
properties.description: Mint address of the token for this spending limit.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Maximum amount that can be spent in the period.

properties.name: period
properties.description: Period type (0=one_time, 1=daily, 2=weekly, 3=monthly).

properties.name: remaining_amount
properties.description: Remaining amount available in the current period.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Current status of the spending limit.

properties.name: last_reset
properties.description: Unix timestamp of when the limit was last reset.

properties.name: signers
properties.description: Array of signer addresses authorized to use this spending limit.

properties.name: destinations
properties.description: Array of destination addresses where funds can be sent.

properties.name: expiration
properties.description: Unix timestamp when this spending limit expires (0 for no expiration).

properties.name: slot
properties.description: Solana slot number when this spending limit was created or last modified.

properties.name: block_time
properties.description: Block timestamp when the spending limit was created or last modified.

properties.name: last_modified_signature
properties.description: Transaction signature of the last modification.

name: RequestKycLinkRequest
description: Request body for generating a KYC link for a Grid user.

properties.name: grid_user_id
properties.description: Grid user ID the KYC link is associated with.

properties.name: type
properties.description: KYC type to request (for example individual or business).

properties.name: email
properties.description: Email address used for KYC communication.

properties.name: full_name
properties.description: Full legal name of the user or business representative.

properties.name: endorsements
properties.description: Optional list of KYC endorsements or additional checks to apply.

properties.name: redirect_uri
properties.description: Optional redirect URI to send the user back to after completing KYC.

name: KycLink
description: KYC verification link data. Contains links and information needed to complete the KYC verification process, including URLs for identity verification and terms of service acceptance.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the KYC verification.

properties.name: full_name
properties.description: Full name of the person or business being verified.

properties.name: email
properties.description: Email address associated with the verification.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of KYC verification (individual or business).

properties.name: kyc_link
properties.description: URL where the user completes KYC identity verification.

properties.name: tos_link
properties.description: URL where the user reviews and accepts terms of service.

properties.name: kyc_status
properties.description: Current verification status.

properties.name: rejection_reasons
properties.description: List of reasons for rejection if KYC was rejected.

properties.name: tos_status
properties.description: Terms of service acceptance status.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the KYC link was created.

properties.name: customer_id
properties.description: External customer ID in the KYC provider system.

properties.name: persona_inquiry_type
properties.description: Type of inquiry in the Persona verification system.

name: KycStatusData
description: KYC verification status data. Contains the current state of a KYC verification process, including verification status, completion requirements, and timeline information.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the KYC verification.

properties.name: account
properties.description: Account address associated with this KYC verification.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of KYC verification (individual or business).

properties.name: status
properties.description: Current verification status.

properties.name: tos_status
properties.description: Terms of service acceptance status.

properties.name: kyc_continuation_link
properties.description: Link to continue the KYC process if verification is incomplete.

properties.name: rejection_reasons
properties.description: List of reasons for rejection if KYC was rejected.

properties.name: requirements_due
properties.description: List of outstanding requirements needed to complete verification.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the KYC verification was created.

properties.name: updated_at
properties.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the KYC verification was last updated.

name: FeeConfig
description: Fee configuration for a transaction, including the fee currency, payer address, and whether fees are self-managed.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: Currency in which the transaction fee will be paid.

properties.name: payer_address
properties.description: Address that will pay the transaction fees.

properties.name: self_managed_fees
properties.description: Whether the client will manage fee payment themselves instead of using Grid-managed fees.

name: PrepareArbitraryTransactionRequest
description: Request body for preparing an arbitrary pre-serialized transaction for signing and fee configuration.

properties.name: transaction
properties.description: Serialized transaction data to be prepared.

properties.name: transaction_signers
properties.description: Deprecated: use account_signers instead. Optional list of signer addresses for the transaction.

properties.name: account_signers
properties.description: Optional list of account signer addresses that should sign this transaction.

properties.name: payer_address
properties.description: Deprecated: use fee_config instead. Optional address that pays transaction fees.

properties.name: fee_config
properties.description: Optional fee configuration specifying currency, payer, and fee handling.

name: RemovePasskeyRequest
description: Request body for removing a passkey from an account.

properties.name: transaction_signers
properties.description: Optional list of signer addresses that must approve the passkey removal transaction.

name: RemovePasskeyQueryParams
description: Query parameters for removing a passkey from an account.

properties.name: admin
properties.description: Whether the passkey being removed is an admin passkey.

name: RemovePasskeyResponse
description: Response returned after removing a passkey from an account.

properties.name: transaction
properties.description: Serialized transaction data for the passkey removal operation.

properties.name: removed_passkey
properties.description: Information about the passkey that was removed.

properties.name: threshold
properties.description: Current account threshold after the passkey removal.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Status of the remove passkey operation.

properties.name: expires_at
properties.description: Expiration time of the transaction or operation, as an ISO 8601 string.

name: Receipt
description: Minimal receipt object containing an identifier, object type, and creation timestamp.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the receipt.

properties.name: object
properties.description: Type of object represented by this receipt.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: ISO 8601 timestamp indicating when the receipt was created.

name: BridgeTransferSource
description: Source details for a bridge transfer, describing where funds originate from and which payment rail and currency are used.

properties.name: payment_rail
properties.description: Payment rail used for the bridge transfer (for example bank, onchain, etc.).

properties.name: currency
properties.description: Currency used for the bridge transfer.

properties.name: external_account_id
properties.description: Optional external account identifier at the bridge or banking provider.

properties.name: bridge_wallet_id
properties.description: Optional bridge wallet identifier used as the source of funds.

properties.name: from_address
properties.description: Optional originating address for the transfer (for example a blockchain address).

properties.name: omad
properties.description: Optional origin message account identifier (OMAD) for bank wires.

properties.name: imad
properties.description: Optional input message accountability data (IMAD) for bank wires.

properties.name: bank_beneficiary_name
properties.description: Optional bank beneficiary name associated with the source account.

name: BridgeTransferDestination
description: Destination details for a bridge transfer, describing where funds are delivered and which payment rail and currency are used.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: Currency used for the bridge transfer destination.

properties.name: payment_rail
properties.description: Payment rail used for delivering funds (for example bank, onchain, etc.).

properties.name: external_account_id
properties.description: Optional external account identifier at the bridge or banking provider for the destination.

properties.name: bridge_wallet_id
properties.description: Optional bridge wallet identifier used as the destination of funds.

properties.name: from_address
properties.description: Optional originating or associated address for the transfer (for example a blockchain address).

properties.name: wire_message
properties.description: Optional wire message for bank transfers.

properties.name: sepa_reference
properties.description: Optional SEPA payment reference.

properties.name: swift_reference
properties.description: Optional SWIFT payment reference.

name: BridgeTransferSourceDepositInstructions
description: Deposit instructions for funding the source side of a bridge transfer, including bank and beneficiary details.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Optional deposit amount required to fund the bridge transfer.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: Currency in which the deposit must be made.

properties.name: deposit_message
properties.description: Optional deposit message or reference that must be included with the payment.

properties.name: payment_rail
properties.description: Payment rail used for the deposit (for example bank, SEPA, SWIFT, etc.).

properties.name: from_address
properties.description: Optional originating address for on-chain deposits.

properties.name: to_address
properties.description: Optional destination address for on-chain deposits.

properties.name: bank_name
properties.description: Optional name of the beneficiary bank.

properties.name: bank_address
properties.description: Optional street address of the beneficiary bank.

properties.name: bank_city
properties.description: Optional city of the beneficiary bank.

properties.name: bank_country
properties.description: Optional country of the beneficiary bank.

properties.name: bank_postal_code
properties.description: Optional postal code of the beneficiary bank.

properties.name: iban
properties.description: Optional IBAN for the beneficiary account.

properties.name: swift_bic
properties.description: Optional SWIFT/BIC code for the beneficiary bank.

properties.name: beneficiary_name
properties.description: Optional name of the beneficiary account holder.

properties.name: beneficiary_address
properties.description: Optional street address of the beneficiary.

properties.name: beneficiary_city
properties.description: Optional city of the beneficiary.

properties.name: beneficiary_country
properties.description: Optional country of the beneficiary.

properties.name: beneficiary_postal_code
properties.description: Optional postal code of the beneficiary.

properties.name: routing_number
properties.description: Optional bank routing number (typically for US domestic transfers).

properties.name: account_number
properties.description: Optional beneficiary bank account number.

properties.name: account_type
properties.description: Optional account type (for example checking or savings).

name: BridgeTransfer
description: Bridge transfer data for fiat-to-crypto or crypto-to-fiat transfers. Represents transfers processed through Bridges payment rails, including ACH, SEPA, wire transfers, and other traditional banking methods.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the bridge transfer.

properties.name: state
properties.description: Current state of the transfer (for example pending, completed, failed).

properties.name: on_behalf_of
properties.description: Grid user ID or account on whose behalf the transfer is executed.

properties.name: source_deposit_instructions
properties.description: Optional deposit instructions for funding the source of the transfer.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Transfer amount as a string.

properties.name: client_reference_id
properties.description: Optional client-supplied reference identifier for idempotency or reconciliation.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: Currency used for the transfer.

properties.name: developer_fee
properties.description: Developer fee amount charged for processing the transfer.

properties.name: source
properties.description: Source details for the transfer.

properties.name: destination
properties.description: Destination details for the transfer.

properties.name: receipt
properties.description: Receipt object containing metadata about the transfer.

properties.name: blockchain_memo
properties.description: Optional blockchain memo or reference used when the transfer touches a blockchain.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the bridge transfer was created.

properties.name: updated_at
properties.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the bridge transfer was last updated.

name: SplTransfer
description: SPL token transfer data for on-chain Solana transfers. Represents native Solana token transfers using the SPL Token program, including both standard SPL tokens and Token-2022 program tokens.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the SPL transfer.

properties.name: grid_user_id
properties.description: Grid user ID associated with the transfer.

properties.name: main_account_address
properties.description: Smart account address that initiated or received the transfer.

properties.name: mint
properties.description: SPL token mint address.

properties.name: is_token_2022
properties.description: Whether the token uses the Token-2022 program.

properties.name: signature
properties.description: Solana transaction signature.

properties.name: confirmation_status
properties.description: Confirmation status of the transaction.

properties.name: from_address
properties.description: Source address of the transfer.

properties.name: to_address
properties.description: Destination address of the transfer.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Raw token amount in base units (no decimals applied).

properties.name: ui_amount
properties.description: Human-readable token amount with decimals applied.

properties.name: decimals
properties.description: Number of decimals for the token mint.

properties.name: confirmed_at
properties.description: Timestamp when the transfer was confirmed, if available.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the transfer record was created.

properties.name: updated_at
properties.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the transfer record was last updated.

properties.name: direction
properties.description: Direction of the transfer relative to the main account (inbound or outbound).

properties.name: environment
properties.description: Grid environment in which the transfer occurred (sandbox or production).

properties.name: instruction_index
properties.description: Index of the instruction within the transaction that performed the transfer.

name: GetTransfersOptions
description: Optional filter and pagination parameters for listing bridge or SPL transfers.

properties.name: payment_rail
properties.description: Filter transfers by payment rail (for example bank, onchain, etc.).

properties.name: status
properties.description: Filter transfers by transfer state.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: Filter transfers by currency.

properties.name: start_date
properties.description: ISO 8601 start date to filter transfers created on or after this date.

properties.name: end_date
properties.description: ISO 8601 end date to filter transfers created on or before this date.

properties.name: tx_hash
properties.description: Filter transfers by a specific transaction hash.

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Maximum number of transfers to return.

properties.name: cursor
properties.description: Pagination cursor for fetching the next page of results.

name: RequestVirtualAccountRequest
description: Request body for creating a virtual account for a Grid user in a specific currency.

properties.name: grid_user_id
properties.description: The Grid user ID.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: The currency of the virtual account.

name: VirtualAccount
description: Virtual account data representing an off-chain account with deposit instructions and a destination for funds.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the virtual account.

properties.name: customer_id
properties.description: Customer identifier at the virtual account or banking provider.

properties.name: source_deposit_instructions
properties.description: Deposit instructions for funding the virtual account.

properties.name: destination
properties.description: Destination descriptor for where funds from the virtual account are ultimately routed.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Current status of the virtual account.

properties.name: developer_fee_percent
properties.description: Developer fee percentage applied to transactions through this virtual account.

name: GetVirtualAccountsQueryParams
description: Query parameters for listing virtual accounts with optional currency filters.

properties.name: source_currency
properties.description: The source currency.

properties.name: destination_currency
properties.description: The destination currency.

name: CreateStandingOrderRequest
description: Request body for creating a standing order (recurring payment) between a source and destination.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Amount to transfer on each execution of the standing order.

properties.name: grid_user_id
properties.description: Grid user ID that owns or initiates the standing order.

properties.name: source
properties.description: Source details for the standing order.

properties.name: destination
properties.description: Destination details for the standing order.

properties.name: frequency
properties.description: Frequency at which the standing order should execute.

properties.name: start_date
properties.description: ISO 8601 start date when the standing order becomes active.

properties.name: end_date
properties.description: Optional ISO 8601 end date after which the standing order will no longer execute.

name: GetStandingOrdersQueryParams
description: Query parameters for listing standing orders with optional filters and pagination.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Filter standing orders by status.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: Filter standing orders by currency.

properties.name: start_date
properties.description: ISO 8601 start date to filter standing orders created on or after this date.

properties.name: end_date
properties.description: ISO 8601 end date to filter standing orders created on or before this date.

properties.name: tx_hash
properties.description: Filter standing orders by a specific transaction hash.

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Maximum number of standing orders to return.

properties.name: cursor
properties.description: Pagination cursor for fetching the next page of results.

name: StandingOrder
description: Standing order data representing a recurring payment, including schedule, status, and remaining amount.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier for the standing order.

properties.name: amount
properties.description: Amount to transfer on each execution of the standing order.

properties.name: currency
properties.description: Currency code used for the standing order.

properties.name: period
properties.description: Execution frequency for the standing order.

properties.name: destinations
properties.description: Array of destination addresses for the standing order.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Current status of the standing order.

properties.name: remaining_amount
properties.description: Remaining total amount that can still be executed under the standing order.

properties.name: last_execution_date
properties.description: ISO 8601 date when the standing order last executed, if applicable.

properties.name: next_execution_date
properties.description: ISO 8601 date when the standing order is next scheduled to execute.

properties.name: created_at
properties.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the standing order was created.

name: GridClientSigner
description: Client-side signer context used by the Grid SDK, representing a primary or backup signer with optional address, email, and session key information.

properties.name: address
properties.description: Optional signer address (for example a Solana public key).

properties.name: email
properties.description: Optional email address associated with the signer.

properties.name: sessionKey
properties.description: Optional session key or provider-specific session data for this signer.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Type of signer, indicating whether this is a primary or backup signer.

properties.name: provider
properties.description: Optional authentication provider used by this signer.

name: GridClientUserContext
description: Client-side user context used by the Grid SDK, including account, user, signer, and session information.

properties.name: address
properties.description: Optional main account address for the user.

properties.name: grid_user_id
properties.description: Optional Grid user ID.

properties.name: signers
properties.description: Optional array of client signer contexts for this user.

properties.name: session
properties.description: Optional active authentication session for the user.

properties.name: email
properties.description: Optional email address associated with the user.

properties.name: otp_id
properties.description: Optional OTP identifier used during authentication flows.

properties.name: provider
properties.description: Optional authentication provider for this user context.

name: PrivyRefreshSession
description: Privy-specific session data for refresh operations.

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: Privy user identifier.

properties.name: session
properties.description: Session data containing authorization keys and wallet information.

properties.name: token
properties.description: JWT token for Privy authentication.

properties.name: privy_access_token
properties.description: Privy platform access token.

properties.name: refresh_token
properties.description: Refresh token for obtaining new access tokens.

name: TurnkeyRefreshSession
description: Turnkey-specific session data for refresh operations. This matches the APIs Turnkey variant of the Session enum. Note: Turnkey refresh is not yet implemented in the API.

properties.name: user_id
properties.description: Turnkey user identifier.

properties.name: api_key_id
properties.description: Turnkey API key identifier.

properties.name: credential_bundle
properties.description: Encrypted credential bundle for Turnkey operations.

name: RefreshSessionKmsProvider
description: KMS provider configuration for session refresh. The API returns both the provider string and the wrapped provider-specific session data.

properties.name: provider
properties.description: The MPC provider type.

properties.name: session
properties.description: Provider-specific session data wrapped by provider name.

name: RefreshSessionRequest
description: Request payload for refreshing an MPC provider session. Used to refresh authentication sessions for MPC providers like Privy, extending session lifetime and updating authorization keys.

properties.name: kms_payload
properties.description: KMS provider configuration and wrapped provider session data.

properties.name: encryption_public_key
properties.description: HPKE public key used to encrypt the refresh session response.

name: RefreshSessionResponse
description: Response payload from session refresh operation. Contains updated session data with new authorization keys and tokens.

properties.name: kms_payload
properties.description: Updated KMS provider configuration and session data.

name: GridClientContext
description: Grid client context grouping the low-level client configuration and the current user context.

properties.name: client
properties.description: Low-level client configuration and environment context.

properties.name: user
properties.description: Current user context including account, signers, and session data.

name: CompleteAuthAndCreateAccountResponse
description: Response returned after completing authentication and creating an account in a single flow.

properties.name: address
properties.description: On-chain address of the created account.

properties.name: status
properties.description: Current status of the account.

properties.name: policies
properties.description: Account policies configuration for the created account.

properties.name: grid_user_id
properties.description: Grid user ID associated with the account.

properties.name: authentication
properties.description: Provider authentication session data for the newly created account.

name: SessionKey
description: Session Key. Represents a generic session key with an expiration timestamp.

properties.name: key
properties.description: The key.

properties.name: expiration
properties.description: The expiration.

name: PasskeyRequest
description: Passkey Request. Defines parameters required to initialize a passkey session, including environment, challenge, and session timing.

properties.name: env
properties.description: Environment in which the passkey request is made.

properties.name: appName
properties.description: Optional application name shown in the passkey flow.

properties.name: userId
properties.description: Optional user identifier for the passkey request.

properties.name: redirectUrl
properties.description: Optional redirect URL after the passkey flow completes.

properties.name: challenge
properties.description: Challenge string that the passkey must sign.

properties.name: slotNumber
properties.description: Slot number used for the passkey session.

properties.name: sessionKey
properties.description: Session key associated with this passkey request.

properties.name: expirationInSeconds
properties.description: Expiration time in seconds for the passkey session.

name: AuthorizePasskeySessionRequest
description: Authorize Passkey Session Request. Contains the session key and metadata required to authorize a passkey session.

properties.name: sessionKey
properties.description: Optional session key associated with the passkey session.

properties.name: metaInfo
properties.description: Metadata information required for passkey session authorization.

properties.name: baseUrl
properties.description: Optional base URL used when authorizing the passkey session.

name: AuthorizePasskeySessionResponse
description: Authorize Passkey Session Response. Contains the URL where the user completes the passkey authorization flow.

properties.name: url
properties.description: URL to redirect the user to for passkey session authorization.

name: SubmitPasskeySessionRequest
description: Submit Passkey Session Request. Contains the authenticator response and session metadata needed to complete a passkey ceremony.

properties.name: ceremonyType
properties.description: Type of passkey ceremony being performed (for example registration or authentication).

properties.name: sessionKey
properties.description: Backend session key associated with this passkey ceremony.

properties.name: slotNumber
properties.description: Slot number used for the passkey session.

properties.name: authenticatorResponse
properties.description: Raw authenticator response returned from the WebAuthn/passkey ceremony.

name: SubmitPasskeySessionResponse
description: Submit Passkey Session Response. Contains the passkey account identifier and an updated session key after completing a passkey ceremony.

properties.name: passkey_account
properties.description: Identifier of the passkey account that successfully completed the ceremony.

properties.name: session_key
properties.description: Updated session key associated with the passkey session.

name: FindPasskeyAccountRequest
description: Find Passkey Account Request. Contains the session key and authenticator response used to look up a passkey account.

properties.name: sessionKey
properties.description: Session key associated with the passkey lookup request.

properties.name: authenticatorResponse
properties.description: Raw authenticator response returned from the passkey/WebAuthn flow.

name: FindPasskeyAccountResponse
description: Find Passkey Account Response. Contains the passkey account identifier and updated session key after a passkey lookup.

properties.name: passkey_account
properties.description: Identifier of the passkey account that was found.

properties.name: session_key
properties.description: Updated session key associated with the passkey account.

name: GetPasskeySessionResponse
description: Get Passkey Session Response. Contains the raw provider-specific session object for an existing passkey session.

properties.name: session
properties.description: Optional provider-specific session data returned for the passkey session.

name: PasskeyCredentialData
description: Passkey Credential Data. Represents the core credential information for a passkey, including its identifier and public key.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Binary credential identifier as an ArrayBuffer.

properties.name: publicKey
properties.description: Public key associated with the passkey credential.

properties.name: credentialId
properties.description: String representation of the credential identifier.

name: PasskeyAssertionResponse
description: Passkey Assertion Response. Contains the WebAuthn assertion fields returned by the authenticator, including signature, client data, and authenticator data.

properties.name: response
properties.type: { signature: string; clientDataJSON: string; authenticatorData: string; publicKey?: string; }
properties.description: Raw assertion response from the authenticator, including signature, clientDataJSON, authenticatorData, and an optional publicKey.
